entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS MORNING, THEN CLEARING
COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 18
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 6 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH IN THE EVENING
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 2 BELOW AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 9 ABOVE
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 18
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR AND COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 10 ABOVE

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY

MOSTLY SUNNY
